body: The wife falls, the friend (antagonist girl) trades the wife to escape slavery and be with the husband, and then the end it seems like the ex wife has a daughter and theyre both slaves to the old guy (who I guess is still alive and fucking) and the ex wife promises her daughter that if she (the daughter) corrupts the boy (who I think is the son of the ex husband and the antagonist girl) then she (the daughter) will be set free? Idk maybe the ex wife wants the som for herself as a way of getting her husband back? Doesnt matter. Nothing satisfying at the end here. No one guilty suffers enough and no one really gets a happy ending.
Well that was a dissapointing ending.
So what happened in the final three pages? He divorced his wife and married the childhood friend that set everything up?
Please translate to English full manga..
please translate into English as soon as possible....thanks so much
